name: LinkTwine
description:
---LinkTwine--

(A little game made in 2 days)

In this game, you control the player with mouse movements.

Avoid all the enemies that want to destroy you.

To help you, a big ball of spikes hooked to your player with a rope can destroy them!

Use precise mouse movements to manage the ball on the enemies !!

Here a video that show you how I make the rope enter the player and the ball:

Credits:

Game made by Felix

Music by Joel palahi gallego

(sound script by Timo)
